the end on the inside of the mitten all content © 2017 inese sang all rights reserved you may not sell copy or distribute this pattern in any format pattern support isangknits@gmail com 4 chart 1 thumb using us 6 4 mm needles join the yarn and pick up the 6 sts from the scrap yarn 1 stitch between the last stitch from the scarp yarn and first stitch from the cast on stitches continue by picking up the 6 co stitches and 1 stitch between last co stitch and the first stitch that was on scrap yarn 14 sts k in the round for 15 rounds thumb decrease round 1 k2tog to the end of round round 2 k2tog to the last st k1 bobble the tip by drawing the tapestry needle
